content.detailedDescription: I was bathing at the beach when i saw out of the sea a bright light almost white made ​​several maneuvers in the sky and then disappeared.
content.summary: big ball of bright light

content.detailedDescription:
My father and i were standing outside looking up at the sky. he does this frequently and i do less frequently. i had gotten my new glasses and love looking at the stars. 
we talk about differing constellations for a moment when the "moving star" catches our attention. we watch it, and it disappears. we don't take our eyes off of the sky. it slowly reappears, moving the same direction. it fades again, only to reappear. once more, it fades, but seemingly for good this time. 

we both thought it was a star until it started moving. around a half hour later, my father noted that it could be a space rock skimming/skipping along the atmosphere. he noted that it left a slight trail, although i didn't quite notice. 

seeing it made me somewhat happy, but perhaps this is due to my personal belief of reincarnation and my particular assumed past life. 
before that dawned on me, though, it was a bit of awe and curiosity. 

we lost sight of the object when it continued to move in its path but faded for the last visible time. 

at first, i assumed it was  part of a triangular constellation but then it moved. pretty bizarre.
content.summary: "star" moving in straight path, fading and brightening thrice, disappears

content.detailedDescription: I live at at a marina downtown.  as i got off my boat and started walking down the dock,.I noticed a glowing orange planet like light at about 55 degrees in the night sky.  at first i thought is was one of the brighter planets, but it was about twice the size of the brightest planet that is observable.  i stopped and watched as it slowly moved towards my right.  it appeared to have no definite course, and as it seemed to slowly head away from where it was the brightest, the light dimmed and went out as if it was extinguished.  i observed the object for about 15 seconds, the object dimmed to nothing during the last three seconds. i do not believe that it was any type of commercial or military aircraft, as it did not display the characteristic lighting, course, and became extinguished.    i have never seen anything like it. there were individuals walking the dock within ear shot of my voice, and even though it was late in the evening, i did yell at a moderate volume,"ufo" as i pointed.  i did not get any acknowledgement of they having heard me. i did call the charleston city police station on lockwood drive and asked if anyone else had called about seeing any objects.  i gave my first name as requested, and was told that no reports had been taken nor had they heard any info relating to the object.
content.summary: A glowing orangish light. it moved across the sky, then decrease in illimination

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling home from a local take out restaurant in malaga new jersey.
i first noticed the triangle black object straight ahead of me at a 45 degree angle, out of my front windshield.  i made a turn on swedesboro rd heading towards my home aprox 1/4 mile away.  i pulled off the road into the grass and got out of my car to see it.  i see planes all the time , night and day, because my home is located on the airlines flight path to phila international airport. this night time object was so different from commercial planes that i had to get out of the car.  the triangle slowly traveled overhead and i could hear a slight hum or whining noise.  there were two green light on one corner of the triangle and two red light on the other corner or back of the object.  there were also two lights, one in the front and one in the back.  i have included a rendering of the object. i first noticed the object in the south west sky and after it traveled over my car it headed to the north east direction then made a turn to the north. i am the chief investigator for mufon in new jersey and i found out there is another similar sighting at 7 pm also in new jersey. i am wondering if these ufo's, or some people call them alien craft, try to copy the light patterns of our own commercial jets so they can hide in plain sight ?  it would make perfect sense to me.  temperature was aprox 50 degrees with no winds and partly cloudy.
content.summary: Black triangle spotter over franklinville nj by a mufon  chief investigator.

content.detailedDescription:
We were out on a familiar country road and noticed about 9 bright orange lights way off in the distance in the night sky. they were in formation of groups of three. they would get to a certain height high into the night sky and then a few appeared to separate. eventually they all faded to black. we saw two more rise what appeared to be from the ground, again bright orange. once at a certain height, one boldly shot in opposite direction as they both faded into the black night sky.

it was amazing enough that other vehicles also pulled ver.
content.summary: Formation of groups of three orange star-like objects ascending and then disappearing in night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was waking my dog when i saw the first two orange objects flying ne.  i was walking toward the house as the objects were flying over the houses. i tried to figure out what they were but when i realized i'd never seen anything like this before so i ran to the house & told my kids to come & see & then every two min we saw them fly over & saw 8 total. as they went over the orange light was dimer from behind the objects. i couldn't hear any noise from them so i asked my daughter if she heard anything and she said no. i was amazed and confused because i don't know what we had seen. i took some pictures with my phone just to show some proof. the sky was clear with some clouds. the normal air traffic looked routine for the time of day. the planes in the sky were clear  & there lights were easy to see. the objects flew into a low cloud until they were out of sight.
content.summary: I was waking my dog when i saw the first two orange objects flying ne so i ran to the house & told my kids to come & see & then every two min we saw them fly over for time & saw 8 total.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to store looked up in sky seen very bright orange light heading my direction watched as it appears to seem like airplane till it moved abruptly then went strait it seemed to brighten then started to flicker then light went out could still see object traveling in same direction i have seen meteorites in past and this wasn't one of them
content.summary: Flew at slow speed in semis strait path brightens then turns invisible but can still be seen traveling at slow speed heading north east not a asteroid

content.detailedDescription: I spent the day at the fairfield county fair that day and had come back to my friends aunts house in pataskala for dinner. while i was waiting for dinner i was laying in a hammock looking up at the sky for airplanes (her house is under a flight line airplanes use as an approach to land). as i was looking up i saw a very small white object, appearing to be a circular or sphere shape, moving very quickly. this caught my attention because the planes that fly over her house are usually high up because they are on a flight path already, or low and slow with their landing gear out. i saw it and immediately knew it wasn't an airplane, the shape not right, it was too small, and it was traveling too high up and too fast with no jet contrail. almost as soon as i saw it, it made an abrupt upward directional change to the right (towards me). it was probably a 20 degree change from the direction it was originally traveling. a few of my friends were nearby and i yelled t the to come over. i tried pointing it out to them, but they didn't see it. they came right as it was getting to the tree line of the forest in her back yard. it was so small and going so fast that even i momentarily lost it when i looked away to tell them to come look at it. the only reason i saw it was because i was looking closely at the sky for planes. i know what planes look like, i've attended airshows since a very young age and my dad works in the aviation field, so i've been around planes all my life. i can assure you that it was not an airplane that i know of. there was no sound, it was too maneuverable, and going too fast. afterwards i felt very frustrated/defeated because none of my friends believed me because they didn't see it and i know that i saw something out of the ordinary. i was also very curious about it afterwards. i came to the conclusion that it was either a drone, or something our government has that we don't yet know about. either way it was an unidentified flying object and i wanted to report it. i've seen a ufo once before and i know it's a real phenomenon. i hope this will help people see that they are out there, even though it was a short and uneventful sighting.
content.summary: Very small orb or circular shape moving at high speeds with a short but abrupt directional change.

content.detailedDescription:
Summer of 1988 benson landing, lake champlain, vt usa me & my 
friend gordy was fishing at the landing this evening and wanted to stay till 
morning. around 3am our fire died out and the latern ran out of fuel. it was too 
dark to look for wood adn the risk of rattle snakes kept us there. we were 
talking about packing up & going home. just then gordy spotted what appeared to 
be a tug boat coming down the lake. but the boats have not been in operation for 
maybe a decade or more. it had white & red lights on the side of it( all around 
as it turned later).As it approached we noticed that there were no waves coming 
to shore and thought this was odd.Just as it was maybe 1/2 to 3/4 of a mile to 
the nw you could tell it was above the water and started to turn to the right. 
just as it was coming out of the turn adn became level it shot off into space 
like a bolt of whitish blue light. the light remianed for a few seconds 
afterwards it was gone, very odd. we decided it was time to go home then & 
there. we told the story to others at work the next day & they picked on us for 
being drunk but neither of us drink. 

i submitted this one before but never see it listed ?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought it was a tug boat coming down lake champlain however those havent been aroudn in years

content.detailedDescription: It was cloudy, dull and dark so i don't think my phone recorded...
content.summary: I don't know if it was...

content.detailedDescription:
I was working as a night watchman at a recycling facility in portland, oregon when this sighting occurred. the date and time given above are approximate.

about halfway through my shift, i was performing a patrol which carried me through a rather dark area of the property. after making sure no dangers were present on the ground around me, i usually took a moment to look up at the stars, due to the reduced glare of city lights in the location i was at.

i noticed movement in the sky and turned my vision toward it. what i witnessed looked like it might have been a satellite reflecting sunlight. however, the object behaved in an unusual manner. it's general direction of travel was from north to south, however, it oscillated in this path with wide arcing motions, the same way a leaf will sway back and forth when it falls. however, this movement appeared to carry it in a horizontal direction, not a vertical one.

the sighting lasted about 30-45 seconds. at this time i decided that it was time to pay attention to my immediate surroundings again. i had judged the object as a curiosity and not an immediate concern. i finished my patrol without further incident and never saw the object again.

i regarded the object as a curiosity and felt no fear or apprehension toward it. it was there and i noticed it, simple as that.
content.summary: High altitude light moving in unusual manner

content.detailedDescription: I was walking, with my dog, the short distance between my mailbox and my apartment.  i usually look up at the stars while walking outside at night.  at first i thought it might just be a plane until i noticed the strange behaviour of its lights.  i considered using my phone to film it but i figured that my phone camera was not good enough to see anything.  i came back in my apartment to look up aircraft lights before i reported it as a ufo.  i lost sight of it by coming back indoors to ask my family about it.
content.summary: Strange flashing lights moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car down robertsville road, marlboro, new jersey, with my girlfriend around 7pm. all of sudden we look up and see something hovering very close to the ground, maybe 20 ft, with red and green non-flashing lights. at first i believed it to be a child's remote control plane or ufo, but it was dark, late, and cold, and definitely not the case. as we approached it, i looked up at it and it just stayed in the same spot hovering up and down with the lights remaining on. i was going to get out and have a look, but my girlfriend got really scared and started yelling for me to keep driving. wish i could of gotten a picture of it, but unfortunately i was driving. i instantly got immense goosebumps all across my body. it felt unnatural, we couldn't believe it. as we passed the object, i looked back in my mirror and it was gone. my girlfriend started to have a panic attack when we got home. she started hyperventilating, feeling nauseous, and light headed. it was just unbelievable. it was the most amazing thing i have ever seen, it was so close, i felt like if i got a ladder i could of grabbed it.
content.summary: Circular object hovering very low to ground with stable lights

content.detailedDescription:
On november 8th, 2013 i got home from work, pulled into the garage, went inside an immediately let the dog out in the backyard.  this was at about 925p.  i saw to the north of me a large number of glowing orange balls in the sky with random spacing.  they were moving in a way that looked like ascending as the came slowly towards my neighborhood.  i made the dog go back inside and stood there watching for a couple of minutes wondering what they were and then remembered my cell phone was in my pocket. the lights were not there less than 2 minutes before when i pulled into my driveway.  

i took several pictures of the lights and a couple of short videos as they moved across the sky.  there was the initial random grouping 6-7 lights, then a second random grouping of about another 6-7 of them and a few minutes later several more in doubles and triples and a few single lights.  they seemed to float across the sky.  there was some individual movement within the groupings but they all followed the north to southeast path across the sky. there was no noise.  i didn't see or hear any other aircraft, helicopters or anything else in the sky during the entire 10 minute event. 

 my first thought was that they were flares, but they did not drop towards the earth at all but continued on in what i believe was a fairly high altitude.  occasionally it looked like one of the lights would sort of accelerate or move away from another light.  this again was quite random. some of the lights appeared to blink out and then come back on. some blinked out completely some stayed steadily glowing for the entire 10 minutes. the orange balls glowed but did not seem to cast any light around themselves.  i thought i occasionally saw an additional tiny red light inside the orange balls blink, but they were at a distance and i'm not sure of that.

in my cell phone pictures the lights appear white but they were glowing orange.  the only photo that captures the right color was one where i tried to zoom in, but with a cell phone camera it is all fuzzy and didn't do me any good except it shows the right color.

they disappeared after they had passed towards the southeast.  i think they just all went out unless my neighbors house blocked me from seeing them if they had come down further out of the air.

i went inside and tried to decide who to call to see what they were.  i decided on the abc 15 news desk.  i spoke to a woman and asked if she had heard of any strange lights over mesa.  she hadn't and didn't know if there was some kind of military exercise over the area either.  i watched the news to see if anything else came out but i haven't heard anything at all. called the news again on november 9th to see if anyone else had reported these.  nothing. these were so bright and so numerous that i can't believe i am the only one who saw these.  there is probably a reasonable explanation, but it seemed very strange to me.  i was not afraid during the event because i judged them to be pretty high in the sky.  afterwards my feelings are just a nagging curiosity to know what i saw and why nobody else seems to have seen or reported this.
content.summary: Orange balls of light travelling n-se over east mesa, az nov 8, 2013

content.detailedDescription:
November 9, 2013 at 4:40 p.M. - from my front window south of odessa, ny i saw what at first i thought was a flock of gulls in the distance.  they were flying from the nw to the se.  upon watching them closely, i could see they were definitely not birds, though there was a "flutter" effect, like the tail of a kite trailing a string of aluminum foil squares attached end to end by their corners (with a small space between them - not corner to corner.)  i said to my wife, "that's weird, what is that?" and ran outside.  definitely not birds!

i put my hands up to my eyes like binoculars to block out surrounding light.  (it was cloudy, though the sun had recently come out in the southwest and was shining under the clouds quite clear and brightly.)  i had never seen anything like what appeared to be very shiny, reflective objects "fluttering" and undulating like a wave slightly up and down.  that's what gave the whole siting the feeling of something perhaps like disposable aluminum pie tins on a string fluttering and spinning about.

i watched it for a while as it flew in the direction of ithaca/danby.  as it flew, behind it, yet it must have been under the clouds, i could see what looked like a star.  but, no star would have been visible in this rather intense (horizontal) daylight.  the "star" did not reflect light, but was giving off its own light.  it remained stationary (ne from my location) as the "two strings of square/diamond-shaped pie tins" passed in front of it.  the speed of the strings was constant (though way too fast for a flock of birds)and may have been similar to a typical plane you would see any day. my mind wanted to interpret the whole thing as a sky-banner, but there was no plane pulling it.

when the double-stringed, sparkly object had gone too far for me to see, i ran in the house and called my son (who lives outside of ithaca - sw)and told to go out and try to locate them.  he went out, but didn't see anything.  perhaps he was looking in the wrong direction.  or, perhaps they were not at an angle where the horizontal sun would have been reflecting light in his direction.

the double-string shape made it look like a group of reflective objects that were curiously organized.  there seemed to be a connective feature mid-way along each string that tied them together.  after the unidentified flying stringy-thingy disappeared in the distance, so did the "star-like" object that was seen beyond it.

i've never seen anything like it, nor heard of anything with this description.  it was not chevron-shaped, because it did not come to a point at one end.  it was two parallel strings of reflective objects with an apparent connection between them in the middle.  i sure wish i had had a real pair of binoculars with me!
content.summary: November 9, 2013, 4:20 p.M. a double string of diamond-shaped reflective surfaces fluttered and ondulated moving in northwest to southeast flightpath.  resembled flat, square, reflective surfaces as if attached to a string and being pulled through the air

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my deck to smoke when i noticed what appeared to be a steady white light moving behind the trees as it neared me the light began to strobe then as it got closer i could tell it was a plane. i did video tape it but that is inconclusive at the moment.
content.summary: Saw white light thru trees then it began flashing then it appeared to be a plane.

content.detailedDescription: A friend took this picture and posted it to facebook. they seemed to be unaware of the object in the picture. the were taking a picture of the skyline because they were grateful to be back in the usa. myself and others commented on the strange object.
content.summary: Picture taken at philedelphia airport

content.detailedDescription:
Observed 3 light on and off every 10 sec or so rotating or banking around each other. when banking we could see flames or sparks coming out (think sparkler) the rear. saw one plane bank around then view became obstructed behind houses. viewed from a mile or so away for about 10-15 min. our subdivision is in the path of the iah airport and all planes in line for landings moved out of the area for another 20 min before i saw another plane.
3 witnesses and iphone video.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 lights circling slowly  around each other the flames of sparks (large) when turning

content.detailedDescription: I always walk my dog between 4am and 5am every day i am very aware of the celestial sky being a hunter and trapper for over fifty years.The three circles appeared at the bottom of the big dipper one inside the other and were pulsating. no other aircraft were anywhere to be seen in any part of the sky. now here is the interesting thing two weeks later at the same time when i went outside the house there was a smell of mir all around our home. ifyou went about fifteen feet away from the home you couldnt smell anything. there were a few other things that were going on but this next one is the most important. again about tow weeks after the other incident my wife woke me up about 2am.Shaking me and saying look lookand at the foot of our bed were three images like sparklers of different sizes and wre pulsating. i wasnt sure what to do and my wife was shaking so i yelled hey and they dissappeard. after thinking about it all this time i should have said who are you and what doo you want. we havve since sold the house and moved to lancaster not because of the happenings at my age 76 we needed to move to town. i reported thie incident when it first happened but only about the circles the other events happened later.
content.summary: Bottom edge of the big dipper three circles made up of silver dics pulsatingi

content.detailedDescription:
It was a windy august day around dinner time.  my wife and i were standing in our driveway talking to our neighbor.  the wind picked up causing me to look directly overhead.  there were two cloud fronts moving toward each other from different directions.  one cloud bank was lower than the other and moved rapidly towards the south, while the other cloud bank moved from the south towards the north.

as i watched the two cloud banks head towards each other, i spotted a bright shiney object directly overhead.  at first i thought the object was a mylar ballon.  it appeared as a constant bright metallic refection in the sun. i kept watching the object waiting for it to move around in the high winds. it was then i noticed that only the cloud banks were moving and the object appeared to be stationary.  i remember thinking, " how could a mylar balloon stay put like that with the high winds ? "

i pointed the ojbect out to my wife and neighbor.  although my wife couldn't see it, my neighbor immediatly spotted the ojbect. a bunch of clouds from the south bound cloud bank began to cover the object.  i figured once the clouds moved on, the ojbect would be gone.  about four minutes after the clouds moved in, there was a hole in the cloud bank.  i looked up and the shiney object was in the exact same place it was before.  the object looked to be approximately 2-3 thousand feet in altitude. i know this because jetliners from minneapolis internation airport where holding an outbound flight pattern, which was directly over my house.  the object appeared to be about two to three hundred feet above outbound air traffic that day.

my next thought was that it might be a bright star.  however, the sun was out and it was a bright fall afternoon. looking around, i could see no other star like ojbects in the sky. next i remembered that there was supposed to be an asteroid passing close to the earth that same day.  the cloud bank recovered the object, so i went inside.  once in my house, i got on the internet to do some research on the asteroid.  as it turns out, the asteroid in question was only visible with a telescope.

approximately an hour later i went back outside to look at the object.  there was a clearing in the cloud formation, so i looked up in the exact same spot the object had been.  it was gone...
content.summary: Stationary mylar ballon shaped object approximately 300 feet above outbound commercial airline traffic.

content.detailedDescription: Fast moving objects
content.summary: Saw fast moving 60 ft object

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend sitting in yard talking. we both noticed i brought light. in looked like a beam. we sat watching it in the same stop for over 30 minutes. it went away then came back. we now have have another other witness.
content.summary: Flashing light in the sky. not moving. no sound. not a spot light. very bright

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from salt lake city to heber city and we noticed a very bright blinking object out of the window, we pulled off the road and watched it make spastic movements up, down, side to side the a red blinking object was ejected off of it and made more spastic movements as it slowly descended then the main object disappeared then appeared over a mile in the distance where it blinked for a few seconds then was gone completely and the red blinking object disappeared behind a hill and we didn't see it again
content.summary: Hovered above ground, spastic movements ejected red flashing object then dissapeared red object descended making spastic movements original object appeared over a mile away  dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Was out in my back yard with my binacolars bird watching. around 1 p.M.(cst) nov. 8th 2013. looking to the south. i seen this hawk flying in circles. while i was watching it with my naked eyes, it vanish, and there is no clouds in the sky. i started looking thru the binacolars at the place where it vanished, and that's when i seen this star like object. it was stationary. i also notice it was lined up, almost half way between the moon,( that was up during the day time), and the sun. it had no kind of lights, it had a shine, but i think it was from the sun reflecting on it. it looked round in shape (like a ball) , and very far away. it had no sound. tried to take video of it, but for some reason my camcorder kept going out of focus, and battery showed full, but after a couple of tries it die. watch object for a couple of hours. it never moved. got tired an went in the house. came back out at 4:30 p.M. it was gone. tried again at around 5:30 p.M. after it was dark. still did not see it. i would have never seen the ufo, if that hawk hadn't vanish right before my eyes.
content.summary: Stationary starlike object towards the south.Seen only with binacolars, around 1 p.M. (cst)

content.detailedDescription: Me and the wife were standing in the driveway and i saw what looked like the empire state building on a platform and was extremely bright glowing red and below the platform you could tell their was another shape there but the white pulsating light was so bright we were unable to make out a shape and it didn't make the slightest sound because i cuffed my ears with my hands too to try and hear anything there was but absolutely nothing i watched it come from the south and move toward the northeast until i could no longer see it because of the tall pines behind my house.
content.summary: Wife and i observed what looked like a iempire state building on a platform

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were traveling on skibo rd in fayetteville nc, when we noticed an orb that appeared to be a meteor or a comet in the sky.  i looked to my wife and said " look at that it, it can't be an airplane, it doesn't have any blinking lights" she said "yeah you're right". we observed it for about 15-30 seconds before the light in the sky appeared to vanish, but not a second later it re appeared in the sky along with two other bright orbs spaced a few hundred feet above it in a vertical formation. they began to decend and they eventually fell behind tree level. were hoping that we are not the only ones to have noticed these three strange orbs in the sky tonight, but i'm most certainly positive that they were not airplanes or helicopters.
content.summary: Bright lights seen from fayetteville nc

content.detailedDescription:
I wanted to take a picture of the beautiful sky with changing color pattern when i took the picture i immediately saw the ball in the picture, but did not notice it in the trees until i enlarged the picture.
the ball shaped object went from the trees to the left heading north.
the one i saw going north bound to beckley the same day was going back and forth from cloud to cloud, but i could not get a picture of it, and it was white.
content.summary: Very strange!

content.detailedDescription: Me, my wife, and 2 yr old son were leavin my aunts house in the southern area of hope mills, nc. my wife (driving) first noticed 1 bigger orangish light hovering at least 300 ft or more above ground level, which looked fairly large and was kind of dull in color, i first thought of a meteor because of color and size, then i noticed it was not moving. that's when the object seemed to either multiply or deploy a smaller brighter orb as the big light simotaniously disappeared from my sight. as the the orb started to move and descend alone i noticed an orange trail very similar to a meteors fire tail, almost identical, but was moving or falling to slow to be one. then as it was falling (in a path similar to a leaf or side to side pattern) we both watched a second orb literally appear out of nowhere, stunned at this point we were both in awe at the orbs movement and color/fire trail of these orbs when the third one popped up a few seconds after the second we were shocked and i was honestley a little scared and worried as these 3 objects gradually descended to the tree line one by one in different  patterns, i turned my phones camera on by this time just to notice that the camera really didnt help, we could see the 3 orbs moving and falling behind the tree line on the video but it doesn't show the brightness or orange/fire like trail behind them as they fall behind the tree line. we drove the the area for a while, not seeing anything except the smaller plane circling a large area around us. after the 30 minute ride home, that same plane with the same lights was still in the same airspace a mile or so up, a lot higher than then the 100-150 feet it was flying when it flew right in front of us as the orbs were falling. i still can't explain what we saw tonight, but i just hope someone else saw what we did. that was actually our second time seeing orange orbs together, we saw 30+ large orange orbs hovering very low directly over a neighborhood in raeford, nc in 2005, as we passed the lights we lost sight behind trees, made 2 u-turns to drive by again but were not there the second time, about 3 minutes later. twice me and my wife have saw orange orbs and cannot explain any of it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 orange lights with trails of flames.

content.detailedDescription:
1. in parking lot of a high school waiting to pick up sibling from school
2. the sun was shining brighter from the east side and then saw this object come from nowhere
3. not sure what the object was at first 
4. the object showed colors of red,green,yellow,and blue from behind the clouds, it was not moving, just seemed to hover,  
5. confused as to what it might be during the sighting and realized it was a ufo after because it just disappeared and left a hole in the cloud.
6. lost sight of the object as it disappeared and saw a black helicopter immediately after which came out of nowhere, flying around the same area of the sighting. also saw an airplane flying in west direction after the ufo was gone
content.summary: Glowing light of red,green,yellow, and blue color, remained stationary behind cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was on my balcony on 21st floor of my condo in downtown vancouver. i usually skywatch with night vision devices anywhere from 1 to 4 hours an evening. this week in question was very quite, no moving targets until early in the morning approx 254 am i noticed a moving object what seemed to be a large satellite in night vision. i scan the skies up and down north to south and east to west when i sighted this object, its my typical grid search., it was moving very slow from about 60-70 degrees above the horizon ne, it would stop and hover for a moment and continue. i then noticed this object was "wobbling" and closer inspection was actually spinning. i looked with naked eye and noticed it looked like a star and i then grabbed my binoculars after about 3-4 mins into the observation and noticed is was white and quite bright but fuzzy, colour almost very light blue. what startled me it had a hole in the  middle, did not seem to be a tower or bubble, just a hole. i followed it for about 15 mins, video edited to about 6 mins on attached video.It circled the ne sky about 2 times and on the second turn it took a direct path ne or more easterly direction and speed increased. i lost view of it over other downtown buildings. i have noticed similar wobbling craft in the past, this seems very similar to another capture i have on my collection of videos. i tried to get feedback from a lot of people to no avail so figure its time to send to mufon. i have captured many odd objects and ufos downtown vancouver and i see a major trend and most objects are head in one specific area of the lower mainland. i have a background in astronomy as a hobby and own telescopes, 2 night vision monoculars and binoculars and i have never seen an object like this in my life except for the other sightings earlier in the year. please let me know what i am filming.!! or if anyone else has seen something similar!! thank you so much! it seems to be a classic disk shape ufo, so i am quite excited! attached video is edited for time and digitally zoomed in to see the craft clearer, the original but edited for time is here. [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Initially noted moving target with night vision and then noticed wobbling/spinning for total 15 mins circling part of city
